import { useState } from "react" const Fresh=()=>{ const[event,setEvent]=useState({ eventName:"", eventExpert:"", eventDuration:0, eventStarted:new Date().toISOString(), eventEnded:new Date().toISOString(), eventVenue:"" }) const eve=(e)=>{ const{name,value}=e.target setEvent((old)=>{ return{ ...old, [name]:value } }) } const save=()=>{ clean() window.location.assign("/") } const clean=()=>{ setEvent(()=>{ return{ eventName:"", eventExpert:"", eventDuration:0, eventStarted:new Date().toISOString(), eventEnded:new Date().toISOString(), eventVenue:"" } }) } return ( <>
) } export default Fresh
